channel.title: y377chen on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in y377chen on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Dr. Yu-Ting Chen
item.description: Yu-Ting Chen is a Postdoctoral Fellow in the Department of Physics and Astronomy at the University of Waterloo. Her research focuses on quantum simulations with trapped ions. She received her Ph.D. from Harvard University in the Center for Ultracold Atoms, where she developed a platform for cavity quantum electrodynamics with Rydberg atom arrays.
